name: R4B-SubscriptionStatus-R5-SubscriptionStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B SubscriptionStatus into a FHIR R5 SubscriptionStatus

element.display: Status information about a Subscription provided during event notification

target.display: Status information about a Subscription provided during event notification
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus`
R4B `SubscriptionStatus.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.contained`

element.display: List of errors on the subscription

target.display: List of errors on the subscription
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.error` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.error`

element.display: Events since the Subscription was created

target.display: Events since the Subscription was created
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.eventsSinceSubscriptionStart` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.eventsSinceSubscriptionStart` - eventsSinceSubscriptionStart has change due to type change: R4B eventsSinceSubscriptionStart string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 eventsSinceSubscriptionStart
R4B `SubscriptionStatus.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `SubscriptionStatus.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.id`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.implicitRules`
R4B `SubscriptionStatus.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `SubscriptionStatus.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.meta`

R4B `SubscriptionStatus.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Detailed information about any events relevant to this notification

target.display: Detailed information about any events relevant to this notification
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent`

target.display: References related to the focus resource and/or context of this event
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.additionalContext` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.additionalContext`

R4B `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.eventNumber` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.eventNumber` - eventNumber has change due to type change: R4B eventNumber string has no equivalent or mapped type in R5 eventNumber

R4B `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`

target.display: Reference to the primary resource or information of this event
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.focus` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.focus`
R4B `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.id`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.timestamp` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.notificationEvent.timestamp`

R4B `SubscriptionStatus.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/subscription-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/subscription-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)

element.display: Reference to the Subscription responsible for this notification

target.display: Reference to the Subscription responsible for this notification
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.subscription` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.subscription`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.text`

element.display: Reference to the SubscriptionTopic this notification relates to

target.display: Reference to the SubscriptionTopic this notification relates to
target.comment: R4B `SubscriptionStatus.topic` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.topic`

R4B `SubscriptionStatus.type` maps as Equivalent to R5 `SubscriptionStatus.type` - type has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/subscription-notification-type|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/subscription-notification-type|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
